titlestmt.titleproper: J. Walter Thompson Company. London Office. Newsletters and publications
Guide to the J. Walter Thompson Company. London Office. Newsletters and publications, 1947-2001 and undated RL.11681
titlestmt.author: Richard Collier

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-12-17 16:10:04 -0500.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: J. Walter Thompson Company. London Office. Newsletters and publications

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: J. Walter Thompson Company. London Office

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History

did.abstract: Founded in 1864, the J. Walter Thompson Company (JWT) is one of the oldest and largest enduring advertising agencies in the United States. The London Office first opened in 1899. Collection includes client case histories, employee orientation and professional development manuals, office histories, newsletters, promotional materials, research reports, subject file periodicals and other printed materials. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Founded in 1864, the J. Walter Thompson Company (JWT) is one of the oldest and largest enduring advertising agencies in the United States. The London Office first opened in 1899, and permanently in 1926.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The J. Walter Thompson Company. London Office. Newsletters and publications were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2008.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], J. Walter Thompson Company. London Office. Newsletters and publications, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2008-0270

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related materials may be found in the following Hartman Center collections:
J. Walter Thompson Company. Corporate documentation;
J. Walter Thompson Company. Newsletters collection;

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection includes client case histories, employee orientation and professional development manuals, office histories, newsletters, promotional materials, research reports, subject file periodicals and other printed materials. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
